mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter of Introduction as Member in Good Standing in the Methodist E. Church of Jacksonville Circuit
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter of introduction as member in good standing in the Methodist E. Church of Jacksonville Circuit for "Bro. C. M. Stigleman" to the members of the M. E. Church in the City of New York from J. Wesley Boteler, dated October 6, 1855, 1 original piece.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Records and correspondence
Methodist Church
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
